headline: Entergy Texas Marks 25 Years of Fan Donations To Help Customers Beat the Heat
summary: THE WOODLANDS, TX / ACCESS Newswire / June 19, 2025 / As rising heat levels and costs of living continue to impact Southeast Texas communities, Entergy Texas marks the 25th anniversary of its annual fan distribution program to help vulnerable customers ...

headline: Entergy price target lowered to $81 from $82 at Morgan Stanley
summary: Morgan Stanley analyst David Arcaro lowered the firm’s price target on Entergy (ETR) to $81 from $82 and keeps an Equal Weight rating on the shares. The firm is updating its price targets for stocks in the Regulated & Diversified Utilities / IPPs North America sector, noting utilities underperformed the S&P in May, the analyst tells investors.
